text.Soon_Aimedis_will_offer: Pronto, Aimedis ofrecerá mucho más, incluido AIMSocial, la plataforma interactiva para pacientes asegurada y respaldada por blockchain y ayudará a los pacientes a apoyarse mutuamente en un nuevo nivel.

text.Aimedis_allows_us_exchange: Aimedis permite intercambiar datos de manera rápida, segura y confiable entre hospitales y consultorios y ofrece servicios que la tarjeta de salud alemana nunca ha logrado ofrecer.

text.Aimedis_connects_me_with_my: Aimedis me conecta con mis pacientes durante todo el día y me permite apoyarlos incluso después de que termina mi horario de práctica. Esto le da un valor real a nuestros tratamientos médicos.
text.Aimedis_supports_patients_doctors: Aimedis apoya a pacientes y médicos al hacer que los datos estén disponibles de manera rápida y confiable, lo que permite un tratamiento rápido, fácil y eficiente.

text.Aimedis_has_been_developed: Aimedis ha sido desarrollado por médicos para pacientes, médicos y hospitales, diseñado para ofrecer a los pacientes el control completo de sus datos y soporte de salud.

text.Flawless_data_exchange: Perfecto intercambio de datos con otras soluciones de almacenamiento médico.

text.Who_gets_most_out: ¿Quién saca el mayor provecho de Aimedis?
text.Support_your_customers: Apoye a sus clientes 24 horas al día, los 7 días de la semana, en todo el mundo, mientras reduce costos, ofrece servicios exclusivos y genera confianza.
text.Connect_yourself_flawlessly: Conéctese sin problemas con los pacientes, el sector ambulatorio, los cuidadores y la industria para mejorar los resultados y ofrecer servicios exclusivos.
text.Connect_patients_worldwide: Conéctese con pacientes de todo el mundo y obtenga acceso a una gran cantidad de participantes potenciales del ensayo.
text.Access_the_patients_data: Acceda a los datos de los pacientes en el momento que lo necesite. Ahorre tiempo y vidas mientras tiene toda la información a mano.
text.Improve_your_patient_contact: Mejore el contacto y el soporte a su paciente al brindarle la opción de acceso a información crucial y recibir recetas en línea, guardadas en el blockchain de Aimedis.
text.Enhance_local_nationwide: Mejore los sistemas de salud locales y nacionales conectando y capacitando a pacientes y cuidadores mientras genera confianza usando el blockchain de Aimedis.
text.Improve_patients_lives: Mejore la vida de los pacientes más rápido.
text.Life_saving_information: Información para salvar vidas cuando es necesaria
text.A_new_kind_of_healthcare: Un nuevo tipo de atención médica: sin límites y efectivo.

text.A_free_ICU_bed: ¡Una cama disponible en UCI a solo un clic de distancia!
text.QM_and_certification_level: QM y certificación a un nuevo nivel
text.With_experts_healthcare_IT: Con expertos en atención médica, seguridad e infraestructura Informática, blockchain y finanzas, Aimedis Consult le permite desafiar el futuro de la atención médica y proteger a sus pacientes y su institución.
text.Aimedis_Consult_also_supports: Aimedis Consulting también lo apoya en equipos médicos.
text.HEALTHCARE_STAFF_HR_PLANNING: PLANIFICACIÓN DE SALUD, PERSONAL Y  RH
text.Find_new_perspectives_with_Aimedis: Encuentre nuevas perspectivas con el personal de Aimedis. Reclutamos personal para todo el sector de la salud en todo el mundo.
text.you_are_need_highly_skilled: Si necesita personal médico altamente calificado, no dude en contactarnos. CONTÁCTENOS AHORA
text.srvc_Aimedis_ICU_bed_finder: Buscador de cama en UCI de Aimedis
text.With_this_Aimedis_module: Con este módulo Aimedis puede encontrar camas disponibles en UCI en segundos y ver la situación de la UCI prácticamente en tiempo real. Esto evita el tiempo largo, agotador e inaceptable que debe pasar el paciente en encontrar una cama disponible en UCI cuando se encuentra en una situación crítica.
text.The_Aimedis_QM_module_as_part: El módulo Aimedis QM como parte del ecosistema médico de Aimedis ofrece a los hospitales, consultorios, compañías farmacéuticas, centros de investigación y farmacias la opción de dirigir a su personal a través de cualquier certificación otorgando todos los documentos, procedimientos y pautas requeridos en tiempo real y en comunicación directa con auditores y jefes de equipo.
text.Aimedis_QM_finally_offers: Aimedis QM finalmente ofrece la posibilidad de cualquier estandarización como ISO 9001, KTQ, QEP, KPQM y manuales de higiene y los pone a disposición en la web, así como en todos los dispositivos iOS y Android.
text.You_manage_your_QM_system: Usted administra su sistema QM de forma ágil, eficiente e intuitiva para cada empleado. Define los derechos – desde la creación hasta la aprobación y el “cierre de sesión” por parte de los empleados.
text.All_online_without_paper: Todo en línea y sin papel.
text.Edit_before_your_usual_office: Editar - como antes en su entorno de oficina habitual
text.Increase_efficiency_productivity: Aumente la eficiencia y la productividad: elimina la recolección física de firmas y el estrés nervioso
text.Revision_levels_safe: Niveles de revisión - seguimiento seguro y constante
text.Permeability_on_smartphone: Permeabilidad - en teléfonos inteligentes, iPad o computadora - visibilidad completa

text.Contact_Support_content: Contenido de la página de Contacto y Soporte
text.If_you_have_question_experiencing: Si tiene alguna pregunta o tiene problemas con Aimedis, puede enviarnos un mensaje de soporte y le responderemos lo antes posible.
text.error_msgAddress: Una dirección de correo electrónico debe contener una sola @
text.aimedis_token_content: contenido de la página de Token Aimedis
text.The_Aimedis_ERC20_based_digital: El activo digital (AIM) basado en Aimedis ERC20 ya se puede utilizar para comprar servicios médicos dentro del ecosistema Aimedis y el portal de segunda opinión de Aimedis. Aceptamos el token a un valor de 0,15 USD por AIM y le damos al titular del token la posibilidad de comprar los servicios, que incluyen video chat con médicos, prescripciones y segundas opiniones con un descuento en comparación con el dinero fiduciario u otros pagos en criptomonedas. No es posible el pago en efectivo de los tokens, pero puede venderlos en uno de nuestros intercambios de socios inmediatamente después de la inclusión.
text.This_is_graph_that_shows: Este es un gráfico que muestra cómo funciona el Blockchain de Aimedis:
text.Whitepaper_for_Aimedis_digital: Libro blanco para el activo digital de Aimedis (AIM)
text.Find_the_technical_specifications: Encuentre las especificaciones técnicas, los detalles de nuestro modelo dual blockchain, el modelo comercial y más en este documento. Puede descargarlo en el lenguaje que elija.
text.Aimedis_Digital_Asset_sale: Acuerdo de venta de activos digitales Aimedis
text.This_AIM_digital_asset_sale: Este es el acuerdo de venta de los activos digitales AIM, que incluye países restringidos y un descargo de responsabilidad.
text.With_Aimedis_launch_AIMsocial: Con Aimedis V2 lanzamos AIMsocial, la primera red médica social descentralizada e incentivada. AIMsocial revoluciona la forma en que los pacientes se comunican y apoyan su camino hacia la salud y el bienestar. Con el lanzamiento, el activo digital de AIM brindará a los pacientes y cuidadores la posibilidad de que se les pague por sus esfuerzos y trabajo dentro de la red, porque creemos que ayudar a los demás debe ser incentivado.
text.Aimedis_supports_fight: Aimedis apoya la lucha contra el COVID-19.
text.For_questions_donot_hesitate: Para preguntas no dude en contactarnos a través de
text.No_doubt_Aimedis_contributes: Sin duda, Aimedis contribuye a la situación real y se enfrenta a los problemas que los pacientes y los profesionales de la salud comparten en todo el mundo. Es por eso que ofrecemos consultas y asesoramiento en video gratuitos en Inglés y Alemán.
text.Just_register_withus_and_send: Simplemente regístrese con nosotros y envíenos un mensaje para saber más
text.TOOLS_FOR_HEALTHCARE: HERRAMIENTAS PARA EL CUIDADO DE LA SALUD
text.Besides_the_Aimedis_platform_offers: Además, la plataforma Aimedis ofrece un diario COVID-19 y herramientas para pacientes y profesionales de la salud, además del último catálogo ICD que admite el código ICD 10 U07.1 (virus del COVID-19 identificado) y U07.2 (sospechoso de tener el COVID-19, virus no identificado) en el lado profesional.
text.Next_Aimedis_has_dense_network: A continuación, Aimedis tiene una densa red de proveedores de productos médicos. Organizamos máscaras para sujetar en las orejas, máscaras FFP2 y FFP3, guantes, anteojos o trajes protectores a precios razonables de proveedores verificados.

text.These_are_the_Terms: These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service.

If You disagree with any part of these Terms and Conditions then You may not access the Service.
text.You_represent_that_you: You represent that you are over the age of 18. The Company does not permit those under 18 to use the Service.
text.use_the_Service_conditioned: Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with the Privacy Policy of the Company. Please read Our Privacy Policy carefully before using Our Service.
text.By_placing_Order_Goods: By placing an Order for Goods through the Service, You warrant that You are legally capable of entering into binding contracts.
text.You_wish_place_an_Order: If You wish to place an Order for Goods available on the Service, You may be asked to supply certain information relevant to Your Order including, without limitation, Your name, Your email, Your phone number, Your credit card number, the expiration date of Your credit card, Your billing address, and Your shipping information.
text.You_represent_and_warrant: You represent and warrant that: (i) You have the legal right to use any credit or debit card(s) or other payment method(s) in connection with any Order; and that (ii) the information You supply to us is true, correct and complete.
text.By_submitting_such_info: By submitting such information, You grant us the right to provide the information to payment processing third parties for purposes of facilitating the completion of Your Order.
text.We_reserve_the_right: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel Your Order at any time for certain reasons including but not limited to:
text.Errors_in_description: Errors in the description or prices for Goods
text.right_refuse_or_cancel: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel Your Order if fraud or an unauthorized or illegal transaction is suspected.
text.Any_Goods_you_purchase: Any Goods you purchase can only be returned in accordance with these Terms and Conditions and Our Returns Policy.
text.Our_Returns_Policy_forms: Our Returns Policy forms a part of these Terms and Conditions. Please read our Returns Policy to learn more about your right to cancel Your Order.
text.Your_right_cancel_an_Order: Your right to cancel an Order only applies to Goods that are returned in the same condition as You received them. You should also include all of the products instructions, documents and wrappings. Goods that are damaged or not in the same condition as You received them or which are worn simply beyond opening the original packaging will not be refunded. You should therefore take reasonable care of the purchased Goods while they are in Your possession.
text.We_will_reimburse_You: We will reimburse You no later than 14 days from the day on which We receive the returned Goods. We will use the same means of payment as You used for the Order, and You will not incur any fees for such reimbursement.
text.You_will_not_have_any: You will not have any right to cancel an Order for the supply of any of the following Goods:
text.The_supply_Goods_made: The supply of Goods made to Your specifications or clearly personalized.
text.The_supply_Goods_which: The supply of Goods which according to their nature are not suitable to be returned, deteriorate rapidly or where the date of expiry is over.
text.which_are_not_suitable_for: The supply of Goods which are not suitable for return due to health protection or hygiene reasons and were unsealed after delivery.
text.after_delivery_according: The supply of Goods which are, after delivery, according to their nature, inseparably mixed with other items.
text.digital_content_which_supplied: The supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium if the performance has begun with Your prior express consent and You have acknowledged Your loss of cancellation right.

text.purposes_of_the_GDPR: for the purposes of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), refers to the Company as the legal person which alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of Personal Data.
text.concept_that_has_been_promoted: is a concept that has been promoted by US regulatory authorities, in particular the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC), for the Internet industry to develop and implement a mechanism for allowing internet users to control the tracking of their online activities across websites.
text.purpose_of_the_CCPA: for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), refers to the Company as the legal entity that collects Consumers’ personal information and determines the purposes and means of the processing of Consumers’ personal information, or on behalf of which such information is collected and that alone, or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of consumers’ personal information, that does business in the State of California.
text.for_the_purpose_the_CCPA: for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), means a natural person who is a California resident. A resident, as defined in the law, includes (1) every individual who is in the USA for other than a temporary or transitory purpose, and (2) every individual who is domiciled in the USA who is outside the USA for a temporary or transitory purpose.
text.California_Consumer_Privacy_Act: for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), means selling, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, a Consumer’s Personal information to another business or a third party for monetary or other valuable consideration.
text.Represented_managing_directors: Represented by the managing directors Michael J. Kaldasch, MD (CEO) and Ben O. El Idrissi, MD (COO)
text.Service_provider_online: Service provider of this online offer and responsible for the content of this site:
text.Aimedis_BV_add: Aimedis B.V., Sint Michaelstraat 4, 5935 BL Steyl, Netherlands
text.Editorial_responsible: Editorial and responsible for the content
text.responsible_for_the_editorial: Aimedis B.V. is responsible for the editorial and content. Further information on the use of the Aimedis platform can be found in our general terms and conditions and data protection regulations. The data protection guidelines describe the handling of personal data.
text.EU_Commission_has_set_up: The EU Commission has set up a website for online dispute resolution between entrepreneurs and consumers, which you can find at http://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/reach. Aimedis B.V. is neither willing nor obliged to participate in a dispute settlement procedure before a consumer arbitration board.
text.Thank_you_for_shopping: Thank you for shopping at Aimedis website and Aimedis app, operated by Aimedis B.V..
text.for_any_reason_completely: If, for any reason, You are not completely satisfied with a purchase We invite You to review our policy on refunds and returns.
text.following_terms_applicable: The following terms are applicable for any products that You purchased with Us.
text.words_initial_letter: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions.
text.following_definitions_shall: The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
text.this_Return_Refund_policy: For the purposes of this Return and Refund Policy:
text.means_individual_accessing: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.
text.ferred_to_as_either: (referred to as either “the Company”, “We”, “Us” or “Our” in this Agreement) refers to Aimedis B.V., Sint Michaelstraat 4, 5935 BL Steyl, Netherlands.
text.refers_the_Application: refers to the Application or the Website or both.
text.means_software_program: means the software program provided by the Company downloaded by You on any electronic device, named Aimedis
text.to_Aimedis_access: refers to Aimedis, accessible from https://www.aimedis.io
text.the_items_offered: refer to the items offered for sale on the Service.
text.mean_request_by: mean a request by You to purchase Goods from Us.
text.entitled_to_cancel_Your: You are entitled to cancel Your Order within 14 days without giving any reason for
text.The_deadline_for_cancelling: doing so. The deadline for cancelling an Order is 14 days from the date on which You received the Goods or on which a third party you have appointed, who is not the carrier, takes possession of the product delivered.
text.In_order_to_exercise_Your: In order to exercise Your right of cancellation, You must inform Us of your decision by means of a clear statement. You can inform us of your decision by:
text.By_visiting_this_page: By visiting this page on our website: https://www.aimedis.io/about
text.refund_By_mail: By mail: Sint Michaelstraat 4, 5935 BL Steyl, Netherlands
text.reimburse_You_no_later: We will reimburse You no later than 14 days from the day on which We receive the returned Goods. We will use the same means of payment as You used for the Order, and You will not incur any fees for such reimbursement.
text.You_buy_a_product_that: In case You buy a product that We order solely for you, you need to pay a 25% retainer, that is not refunded in case of a cancellation of the order as soon as the ordered product is ordered and paid to the provider/manufacturer.
text.order_for_the_Goods: In order for the Goods to be eligible for a return, please make sure that:
text.Goods_were_purchased: The Goods were purchased in the last 14 days
text.Goods_are_original: The Goods are in the original packaging
text.The_Goods_used_damaged: The Goods were not used or damaged
text.receipt_or_proof_purchase: You have the receipt or proof of purchase
text.The_following_Goods_can: The following Goods cannot be returned:
text.supply_Goods_made: The supply of Goods made to Your specifications or clearly personalized.
text.supply_Goods_which_according: The supply of Goods which according to their nature are not suitable to be returned, deteriorate rapidly or where the date of expiry is over.
text.supply_of_Goods_which: The supply of Goods which are not suitable for return due to health protection or hygiene reasons and were unsealed after delivery.
text.supply_Goods_which: The supply of Goods which are, after delivery, according to their nature, inseparably mixed with other items.
text.We_reserve_right_refuse: We reserve the right to refuse returns of any merchandise that does not meet the above return conditions in our sole discretion.
text.Only_regular_priced_Goods: Only regular priced Goods may be refunded. Unfortunately, Goods on sale cannot be refunded. This exclusion may not apply to You if it is not permitted by applicable law.
text.responsible_for_the_cost: You are responsible for the cost and risk of returning the Goods to Us. You should send the Goods at the following address:
text.held_responsible_for_Goods: We cannot be held responsible for Goods damaged or lost in return shipment. Therefore, We recommend an insured and trackable mail service. We are unable to issue a refund without actual receipt of the Goods or proof of received return delivery.
text.exchange_product_same: If you need to exchange a product for the same one, contact us. Please note that We only replace Goods you received defective or damaged.
text.Goods_were_marked: If the Goods were marked as a gift when purchased and then shipped directly to you, You”ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned product is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to You.
text.marked_gift_when: If the Goods weren”t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the Order shipped to themselves to give it to You later, We will send the refund to the gift giver.
text.questions_about_our: If you have any questions about our Returns and Refunds Policy, please contact us:
text.words_which_the_initial: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions.
text.same_meaning_regardless: The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

text.individual_accessing_using: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

text.The_information_contained: The information contained on the Service is for general information purposes only.
text.The_Company_assumes: The Company assumes no responsibility for errors or omissions in the contents of the Service.
text.In_event_shall_Company: In no event shall the Company be liable for any special, direct, indirect, consequential, or incidental damages or any damages whatsoever, whether in an action of contract, negligence or other tort, arising out of or in connection with the use of the Service or the contents of the Service. The Company reserves the right to make additions, deletions, or modifications to the contents on the Service at any time without prior notice.
text.The_Company_warrant: The Company does not warrant that the Service is free of viruses or other harmful components.
text.information_about_health: The information about health provided by the Service is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent disease. Products, services, information and other content provided by the Service, including information linking to third-party websites are provided for informational purposes only.
text.Information_offered_by: Information offered by the Service is not comprehensive and does not cover all diseases, ailments, physical conditions or their treatment.
text.Individuals_are_different: Individuals are different and may react differently to different products. Comments made on the Service by employees or other users are strictly their own personal views made in their own personal capacity and are not claims made by the Company nor do they represent the position or view of the Company.
text.Company_liable_any: The Company is not liable for any information provided by the Service with regard to recommendations regarding supplements for any health purposes.
text.Company_makes_no_guarantee: The Company makes no guarantee or warranty with respect to any products or services sold. The Company is not responsible for any damages for information or services provided even if the Company has been advised of the possibility of damages.
text.Service_can_offer_health: The Service can offer health, fitness and nutritional information including, without limitation, advice and recommendation, that is provided solely as general education and informational purposes.
text.Use_the_advice_info: Use of the advice and information contained herein is at your sole choice and risk.
text.rely_on_this_information: You should not rely on this information as a substitute for, nor does it replace, professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult your physician or healthcare provider before beginning any nutrition or exercise program.
text.info_without_prior: If You choose to use this information without prior consent of your physician, You are agreeing to accept full responsibility for your decisions and agreeing to hold harmless the Company.
text.Service_may_contain_links: The Service may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with the Company.
text.Company_does_guarantee: Please note that the Company does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.
text.Third_party_advertisements: Third party advertisements and links to third party websites may also appear while using the Service. The Company does not make any representation as to the accuracy or suitability of any of the information contained in those advertisements or websites and does not accept any responsibility or liability for the conduct or content of those advertisements and websites and the offerings made by the third-parties.
text.links_other_websites: Third party advertisements and links to other websites where goods or services are advertised are not endorsements or recommendations by the Company of the third party sites, goods or services. The Company takes no responsibility for the content of the ads, promises made, or the quality/reliability of the products or services offered in all advertisements.
text.monetize_and_pay: In order to monetize and pay for the operation of the Service, the Company may receive compensation (either monetarily or through free products) for reviews, or endorsement of a particular company, product, or service.
text.Company_remains_independent: The Company remains independent and reviews are done based on the Company’s own opinions regardless the compensation that can be received.
text.accordance_with_Federal: In accordance with the Federal Trade Commission’s policy of the United States, articles which contain a company, product or service review for which a compensation has been received, will include a disclaimer.
text.information_given_Service: The information given by the Service is for general guidance on matters of interest only. Even if the Company takes every precaution to insure that the content of the Service is both current and accurate, errors can occur. Plus, given the changing nature of laws, rules and regulations, there may be delays, omissions or inaccuracies in the information contained on the Service.
text.responsible_any_errors: The Company is not responsible for any errors or omissions, or for the results obtained from the use of this information.
text.Company_may_copyrighted: The Company may use copyrighted material which has not always been specifically authorized by the copyright owner. The Company is making such material available for criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, or research.
text.Company_believes_constitutes: The Company believes this constitutes a “fair use” of any such copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the United States Copyright law.
text.use_copyrighted_material: If You wish to use copyrighted material from the Service for your own purposes thatgo beyond fair use, You must obtain permission from the copyright owner.
text.Service_may_contain_views: The Service may contain views and opinions which are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any other author, agency, organization, employer or company, including the Company.
text.Company_believes_this_constitutes: The Company believes this constitutes a “fair use” of any such copyrighted material as provided for in section 107 of the United States Copyright law.
text.Comments_published_users: Comments published by users are their sole responsibility and the users will take full responsibility, liability and blame for any libel or litigation that results from something written in or as a direct result of something written in a comment. The Company is not liable for any comment published by users and reserve the right to delete any comment for any reason whatsoever.
text.Service_provided_with: The information on the Service is provided with the understanding that the Company is not herein engaged in rendering legal, accounting, tax, or other professional advice and services. As such, it should not be used as a substitute for consultation with professional accounting, tax, legal or other competent advisers.
text.no_event_shall_Company: In no event shall the Company or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever arising out of or in connection with your access or use or inability to access or use the Service.
text.info_Service_provided: All information in the Service is provided 'as is', with no guarantee of completeness, accuracy, timeliness or of the results obtained from the use of this information, and without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including, but not limited to warranties of performance, merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
text.Company_will_liable: The Company will not be liable to You or anyone else for any decision made or action taken in reliance on the information given by the Service or for any consequential, special or similar damages, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.
text.React_native_js: React native / JS, Node JS, NoSQL, PHP
text.At_World_Vision: At World Vision, we're sharing a big dream for children. One that moves beyond just clean water or food or healthcare to offer a full solution to poverty.
text.children_have_everything: We want children to have everything they need to thrive, both physically and spiritually, so they can experience the kind of life God intends life in all its fullness.
text.degree_in_design: Bachelor’s degree in design, digital art, interaction design or related field or equivalent work experience (eight years).
text.Previous_work_experience: Previous work experience implementing, managing and / or leading within the digital creative field, 8-10 years, preferably in an agency (internal or external) environment.
text.least_years_UX: At least 5 years of UX design as a key, hands-on interaction / visual designer of a UI / UX team through the product development cycle.
text.Expansive_knowledge_layout: Expansive knowledge of layout, typography, mobile technology and web-based graphics and animations, and expert knowledge of design programs including Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, InVision.
text.Motion_design_skills: Motion design skills preferred. A portfolio of sample projects will be requested.
text.degree_design_digital: Bachelor’s degree in design, digital art, interaction design or related field or equivalent work experience (eight years).
text.work_experience_implementing: Previous work experience implementing, managing and / or leading within the digital creative field, 8-10 years, preferably in an agency (internal or external) environment.
text.years_UX_design: At least 5 years of UX design as a key, hands-on interaction / visual designer of a UI / UX team through the product development cycle.
text.layout_typography_mobile: Expansive knowledge of layout, typography, mobile technology and web-based graphics and animations, and expert knowledge of design programs including Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, InVision.
